website_summaries.verdict: Strong battery life and decent audio quality are two things that might tempt you into opting for these inexpensive earbuds, but that isn’t the whole picture. Chunky construction and hit or miss performance in several areas make the Hi Hurricanes difficult to recommend. Video syncing issues also rule them out for anyone who wants to use the buds for YouTube or Netflix.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and performing ear buds!
customer_reviews.text: Great price on these solid little blue tooth earbuds. Use them on my commute and day to day listening. the battery life is good and between non use when I put them back in their case the battery has not run out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Grzybowski

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality headphones for a great affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Despite the structure of the ear pieces being large, they sit comfortably in your ears and never fall out. Sound quality is very good, ease to connect, allows you listen to music for a very long time which is my intended use. Overall summary on this product, perfect product.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Great and Value for money product
customer_reviews.text: I am a real fun of bluedio devices. I have mainly bought headphones and this was my first attemp with earphones. As like the other times, Bluedio didn't dissappointed me offering another value for money product with great sound quality and really comfortable on the ear despite their size.
customer_reviews.author: geo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ear pods
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality ! Much cheaper than Apple AirPods and from what I could see just as good ! I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Good earphones ,good quality sound for the price , the only negative a little hard to get out of the charger , apart from that I could not fault them
customer_reviews.author: M LOWE

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: You're paying 15 quid or whatever for wireless earphones, what do you expect? They're not prfect but for the money you pay they are definitely worth it. Connected to my phone with ease, clear sound, relatively loud, fit in the ear nicely and come with interchangeable ear buds to fit your ear. Case is plastic but stays shut and charges like its supposed to. Overall these are decent and you can't complain based on price
customer_reviews.author: Charles Brooke-Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Surpsingly good
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly good headphones for the budget price. Battery life is superb and sound quality is perfectly acceptable. I wanted to test how well i got on with completely wireless headphones. Unfortunately they drive me mad because as soon as they finish charging they automatically connect to your phone by design. Usually im charging for the next day so if i didnt notice they had connected, they would be flat in the morning. More commonly im using my phone wondering why the sound has suddenly just stopped before i realise the headphones have finished charging and so its reconnected.
customer_reviews.author: andy h

customer_reviews.title: Hi! Great Easy to Use Ear Buds..
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased I ordered these ear buds. They are so easy to set up. They look great and sound quality is clear and crisp. Inexpensive representing great value for money. Cosing only £16.99 they are agreat buy. The come complete with a USB cable for recharging from your lap top or PC.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Just couldn’t get used to being uncomfortable...
customer_reviews.text: The design of this item is very good. It sits in a small compact box and looks quite classy in line with the leading market version. Unfortunately, whilst the sound was just average, I found the ear buds very uncomfortable. Are used all three different sizes supplied and still have the same affect. There is no way I could have a long telephone conversation with these, it was just annoying and painful! I have observed great positive reviews on the sale page and it’s good to see that obviously I am just in the minority.
customer_reviews.author: Kettle Delight

customer_reviews.title: Charging port broke!! Good headphones while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones while they lasted. Charging port stopped charging so now I'm unable to charge the the headphones up. Ok sound quality and noise cancellation when they were working.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value and gets big thumbs up from my household’s toughest critic 😉
customer_reviews.text: Hugely impressed with these. Bought for my teenager who’s picky about brands and image, but still everything needs to survive the school commute, absent-mindedness and the general rough and tumble of teenage life! These earbud-style devices look good and the sound quality packs a much better punch than I expected them to. Teenager is really happy which is a BIG result as far as I’m concerned. Great value. Really pleased with what could have been a risky purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Naranjas

customer_reviews.title: Look far more expensive than they are - excellent all round.
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted some wireless headphones for his birthday that resembled onle of the big brands 😉. These are perfect. They look the part and are far better in black than the white that the other manufacturer uses. The sound is excellent, ceetainly comparable with much more expensive headphones. It's also a surprise how well these work, considering the small size. The stated battery life is also very good. Overall, I can highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: ◀Daddy Android▶      🇬🇧

customer_reviews.title: They died very fast :-(
customer_reviews.text: I Loved these Headphones, until today. I went for my usual run, put them in connected as they always do and then half way round my run the left ear just stops. Nothing, no sound. It wont turn on at all :-( Surely 2 months is not the lifespan of these headphones. I am very gutted i know longer have a working pair :-( I even bought a pair for a friend i enjoyed them so much now sadly they are dead.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy
customer_reviews.text: First thing first, when it first arrived and I opened the box the headphones looked as if they were already been used. Disappointing. Second it doesn't work properly and the sound goes away sporadically. Lastly the battery doesn't last four days as promised. Would NOT RECOMMEND THIS ITEM AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Jaqueline Caccavale

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a bit dubious about purchasing these due to their size, however, they fit in your ear so comfortably. They're extremely easy to use and pairing them with your phone is a doddle. The sound quality is fantastic. I'm not sure if they're advertised as 'noise cancelling' but they do appear block out all surround sounds, due to their snug fit. Taking the right earbud out and lowering it, automatically pauses the music - which is an amazing feature. The earbuds are a fantastic price - I would have paid twice as much for them given the sound quality and the snug fit alone. Would I recommend them? Absolutely
customer_reviews.author: KurtH

customer_reviews.title: Rubish for phone calls !!!
customer_reviews.text: This earphones are rubbish. Charged them 100% and last for about 2 1/2 hours not 5 as they are marketed. The sound quality is not so bad when listening to music but when I make a phone call is terrible. My friends barely hear me and also because of the noise cancellation which does not exist at all they hear every sound next to me 10x more than me. It disconnects many times. I just initiated the return. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good value, with one very annoying design feature.
customer_reviews.text: Note: I bought these in a lightning deal for £14. Sound quality isn't great, but about what you would expect form detached in-ear earphones. Battery life is great, particularly when considering that they can be charged by their case! Main complaint is that the face detection (turns msuic off if you remove the right earphone) doesn't work well. Music will often turn off for no reason, or will continue if both earphones are removed. It's an annoying bug....
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: If you must waste money don't do it on these
customer_reviews.text: These are very cheap in price and the case is so cheap that you will find it difficult to get them out of the case once you have put them in. They sometimes connect ok and other times they don't which can make them complete pain. The shock for me was that they don't sound bad when you are making a phone call. But as for sound overall, the quality is rubbish and they are a level of really bad distortion when it comes to listening to music. The plus side is that I don't worry when it comes to losing these even if they do fit well in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Trowbridge

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice little earbuds but the quality of the audio is a little muffled. They’re a bit heavy on the bass but with a few tweaks in the equaliser, it’s not too bad. Battery life is a tad less than advertised but I haven’t had a pair or buds that manages to be accurate there. Comfort-wise they’re OK, but I did have to change the eartips with a set of INAIRS (which I highly recommend), after a while. Overall, not bad for the price. I’d recommend them to anyone on a budget if they have the patience to customise the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Sibley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 sets for my daughters for Christmas. I can only review one set as excellent. Battery time is good.easy to connect to iPhone. She is highly impressd said these best earphones she ever had. I have 2 sets that I haven't received reviews. Will update. I bought purely off the reviews on Amazon so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: decent pair for the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Decenr sound for the price. Slighlty bulk for the ear but not to much. Slightly arkward using the proximety sensor as sometimes its to sensitive it seems. Charging case may seen slightly slimsy and the voice is annoying when you turn on the headphones. Still would recomend for the build and quility for the price. I would say the pros far outway the cons.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas goddard

customer_reviews.title: BRILLIANT!!
customer_reviews.text: What is there not to like? Perfect for my commute and was wonderful in the gym, they stayed put! I cannot recommend these any more. The box charges them when they run low effectively and the connectivity is so strong at times it won't let go..or that may be me forgetting they are in my pocket. I really thought I would have to spend hundreds and that does not belittle the product only enhances its VFM.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Dube

customer_reviews.title: Sound really good
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice sounding ear buds, I had already bought my girlfriend a set of buds, then my stepdaughter, so thought it was time I had a set, I am very happy with these, easy to pair and the sound is good. They also lasted me over 3hrs continual use before I popped them back into their charging case
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great bit of kit for the money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for the money. I bought mine at 14.99 as a backup to my B&O E8s. They are much easier to use, the connectivity never fails (unlike the E8 's). OK the sound isn't of the same quality but it's good enough coupled with an equaliser app. In hindsight would I buy the Bluedio or the B&O again. Bluedio every time and pocket the £220 difference.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Terrible sound quality that is hollow and toneless. Much larger than the promo images suggest. Not very comfortable. Pros: Cheap. Okay battery life. Wouldn't recommend these as the sound quality is poor. Music is lifeless through these. The built in mic is useless for calls due to the way the noise reduction works. Even though they are fairly inexpensive, they are simply not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Issy

customer_reviews.title: Quick charging and looks good in the ear.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this item, connectivity was quick and sound quality is excellent, and the range of the Bluetooth is unreal, I can and have left phone in bedroom and gone outside to chat whilst smoking and this signal stayed the same, not even a flicker or stuttering of other persons speech, I was able to hear every word clearly. Very happy with purchase and it's a really big possibility that I am going to be purchasing a few more of these, gonna keep 1 or 2 pairs as spares and give some to family/friends as presents :-)
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Bit tricky to pair but managed in the end. Dont fit my ears very well, but maybe its my ears 😉
customer_reviews.author: bev

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones for the money, not great battery life
customer_reviews.text: These are the cheapest wireless earphones I could find and I think they're pretty good considering what I paid for them. The range is pretty good - I can leave my phone downstairs and still hear my music playing upstairs when I'm wearing the headphones. The only thing that's a bit disappointing is the battery life. I think they've got about a day of life in them, if you don't use them too much, meaning I've been left without music on a few occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Scott

customer_reviews.title: For this price range, they are top quality
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with these earphones. Didn’t realise how much I would appreciate not having wires. Lightweight case provides a quick recharge whenever needed. Pros: Good sound quality, good battery life, and syncs audio perfectly when watching YouTube (unlike some other budget Bluetooth headphones I have tried). Cons: Ambient noise is not blocked out, so while perfect for sitting on a bus, they are less useful on a noisy section of the London Underground. Wish volume could go slightly higher to compensate for this!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: good quality on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, Really easy to pair with devices and are ideal for an office environment as there's good noise cancelling and very little bleed. The automatic pausing is really useful when the right bud is removed for conversation purposes. The sound quality isn't amazing, but for the price its good. Haven't tried them outside yet so cannot comment on the issues other people have had, but as a budget pair of earphones they hold up really well
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Tooke

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level bluetooth headphones with some drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you really can't beat these little headphones. They're decent sound quality, block out noise, hold well in the ears and have a song forward/backward and start/stop function when pressing the buttons on them. Negatives are that they look quite silly, battery life is pretty bad (empty after using them for about 2 hours) and the microphone for calls is pretty much unusable. There is also a slight delay with video but nothing too bad. Like I said, given what you pay for, it's a great little product that I use everyday for commuting and editing.
customer_reviews.author: taxidriver

customer_reviews.title: They are MASSIVE
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong, they work great - sound is a bit tinny, but thats what you get for under £20. I was a little taken aback by the size of them tho. I am 6'3", and am a larger than normal male - and they still look comically large in my ears. So although they are functionally fine, they do take some getting used to.... and maybe buy a hat to cover them too ;O)
customer_reviews.author: Mr Michael Seipp

customer_reviews.title: Good value but glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money and fairly stylish. Unfortunately the ones I received are very glitchy. I have had to return my item. Each headphone connects and disconnects separately. They fail to turn off when put away. They even connect and play when they have been put away in the housing unit, which drains battery life. They have a very annoying intermittent on off connection flicker when playing audio. Also they echo telephone calls for the person on other line. Perhaps I received a damaged unit. I’ll try the upgraded set.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Giuliano A Antonucci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband as a last minute stocking filler. He loves them. He says that they have really helped improve his gym work out because he can just carry on working out without a wire getting in the way. The only thing he said was a bit strange at first was getting used to the voice in the ears when you have an “incoming call” Now he just finds it hilarious.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna H

customer_reviews.title: Earphones Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Do not hesitate to order these. I received some as a present and just love them. I have now ordered some for my grandson and he is 'well pleased' with them. Great tone, easy to use and connect. Excellent seller as both times they were delivered before the expected date. I shall get some more for family as Birthday and Christmas gifts. Many thanks
customer_reviews.author: L.Granderson

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say these earphones are very good and the battery life is excellent I've had a good 5/6 hours constant listening to you tube out of mine .I use them in my garage while working with noisy tools ,I get to stem the silence of working on my own and hear some good sounds while I work .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: Sorry do be a party pooper but found the quality of the sound distinctly average and flat. Not particularly comfortable, but the for the expenditure was not expecting sonic perfection. I think I shall stick to my cheaper non bluetooth Beltron which eclipses these in terms of sound quality and cheaper to boot.They are sooo bad I cannot even bother to claim a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. MK Potts

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality but connection is rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Good headphones, and sound quality is good, however they are a pain to try and connect both of them. When will disconnect and the other would connect, and vice versa. Had to send back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. (Not much at all) DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: So many issues with this little thing. Pairing its a hell. Battery life on my one is 1 hour max. Connection constantly lost from one earphone to the other. Not good. But for the price it's good if you want to use them for couple of minutes a day as a replacement until you get a proper one.
customer_reviews.author: Bex&Gabz

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just listening now on my way to work, and have to say, sound is amazing! Nice and clear. When I saw these earphones yesterday after unpacking the box I thought these are too big, but actually they fit me perfectly, don't slide out of my ear (I always had troubles with this). And I love how beautiful bass sound (drum'n'bass lover)! For this price, very very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana Kosirelova

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with charging system
customer_reviews.text: charging system is really confusing, only one blue light on left side of the charger appears & despite putting the whole charger on charge with both bluetooths inside, it never gets 100% charged, it seems very cheap quality casing & not worth it for a proper long term use as battery dies quickly
customer_reviews.author: Asfund Khan

customer_reviews.title: Little beauties!
customer_reviews.text: These little beauties will give Apple a run for their money! The instructions were very understandable regarding different operations. Before I bought the earphones I noticed that people had mentioned difficulty with extracting them from the charging case. However, I found that by just twisting them a little to the right or left allows the plugs to pop out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for money. Good performance and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. This is my second pair of these. One died without warning but at this price it’s hard to complain. Some sort of auto stop-start when you take one out is unreliable, but a minor fault. Good enough. I’m sure better are available but £200+ for AirPods doesn’t represent value for money. Also, if I tread on or lose one I won’t cry ...
customer_reviews.author: MJHB

customer_reviews.title: I used to like these
customer_reviews.text: I am getting so fed up with these! The power Osborn and off all the time no matter how many times I trouble shoot! I charade them fir a full day and all I hear is , ‘Power off, Power on, pairing mode, on, off all the time! It’s good when it works but after ten minutes, it turns off
customer_reviews.author: J-Bo

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk. In my opinion.
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Sound was tinny. Case was plasticky. I bough these for £12.99 in a “Black Friday” deal. Then saw they were £5 on eBay. I wouldn’t say these are worth a fiver.
customer_reviews.author: Better call Paul.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Day one, Paired really easily, and sounded good Day Three, unable to use for calls, s the sound for the person at the other end was not coming through and sounded really distant Week Two, Right bud wont charge and keeps turning itself off. Disappointing as this is the first small product from Bludio i have bought. All larger earphones (four sets in all) still work perfectly and would still recommend... As far as the buds go? Until they have the same consistent quality of the larger earphones, id look elsewhere. C'mon Bludio, you can do better.
customer_reviews.author: sql novice

customer_reviews.title: Good for that money, but should really spend more
customer_reviews.text: Sound isn't really that good. Difficult to operate (individual operations on each one) but the most difficult is the battery life. Need to check always If they've been turned off or not, once put in the charging case I think they turn on themselves, so charging isn't that good because they're on and consuming power. Good price, tws, and good ear fit
customer_reviews.author: Ionescu George

customer_reviews.title: Great quality of the sound and sit quite firmly.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great and affordable headphones that stays firmly in your ear. The case is very lightweight and very small. I like that unlike a lot of other headphones these are in black colour. You will stands out of the crowd. The sound quality is really great as well as battery life. Pretty accurate as in the description. Highly recommended especially for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei I

customer_reviews.title: Went faulty after 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these earphones. Comfortable fit. Good Bluetooth range. Compact and fast charging. Also can work independently . These went faulty after 6 months when the right earphone stopped charging. Amazon said they are only covered for 6 months and I was 7 days over that date. Nothing can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hornagold

customer_reviews.title: Great christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product I have to say, no lies about its ability or hyping its self up. great battery power with an additional 20 hours in the docking station, quality sound for the price you pay and a solid build of earphone. In all I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee-Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great little buy
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them long enough to know about the true battery life but they haven't died on me yet. Great value for money, nice sound, nice look, easy charging box. The earphones are larger than I would like but for the price I can't complain, better than spending hundreds on a branded pair just for the name
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: It's very temperamental about connecting consistently. Once it's connected it pauses music without being directed to do so. They don't turn off manually, therefore it's a battle to stop a podcast and not have the headphones over right it and Co tinue it. I'm a little dissapointed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds give a good performance for a small price. Choice of bud size so good fit. Range is good so I can leave my phone on the side whilst I garden. Easy to charge. I do find them reluctant to pair and connect at times and the right one seems to lose signal and cut out, even though they are charged and close to the phone. Otherwise nice and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: sarah plant

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: For the money, they're not bad. But they're not brilliant either. Quite difficult to get out of the charging case as they're charged by pins that insert into the bottom of the ear pods. Think there's better out there for the money
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hockley

customer_reviews.title: Ugly, random pausing, not very load but good battery
customer_reviews.text: They look stupid so if you dont care about that then get it. It can be annoying because it thinks you have taken out a headphone when you haven't so it pauses they also don't stay in well I would recommend that you but one without the bit that sticks out the bottom they are more comfortable and don't look dumb.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: they are okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: The button at the side means that if you are wearing a hat that covers your ears then it constantly pushes the button. the sound is good and the battery life is good. it's just that the button is in the wrong place for it to be practical.
customer_reviews.author: lou

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price, way bigger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Thought these would be a similar size to the apple ones, hence why I bought them, but these are massive. The shaft to it is about an inch and a half long and it also has a larger than necessary battery pack. Little disappointed as it's a gift.
customer_reviews.author: daniel young

customer_reviews.title: Read this review before buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphones a few days ago and I had them for like a day , they are so amazing , They fit in my ear comfortably and they way they are designed makes noice cancellation more effective , the sound quality is really good i like them for the sound quality as well , the battery from what I’ve seen it lasts for abt 20 hours is extraordinary .
customer_reviews.author: Nisa

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased in place of a pair that had stopped working. So far they have been very good although not used them a great deal as currently at home and we’re bought for using at work.
customer_reviews.author: Allycat

customer_reviews.title: This product broke in one week
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this item. Not sure how this product got so many 5 stars. Mine broke with in a week. Right hand side doesn't charge and the left had side piece repeatedly says "started & pairing mode" but never connects. I have returned this item with the return period but never received any refund. I had to followup with customer care and show the proof of delivery to get my refund. Please don't waste your time with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor overall performance
customer_reviews.text: Over emphasis on bass frequencies detracts from middle and high frequency response. The consequence is that both with music and spoken-word listening, the clarity of delivery is very poor. I have therefore returned the device as unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C

customer_reviews.title: There good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin , sound is really good on them . But I find this pair , lacks a bit on bass . Just not deep enough on most songs and music, for £20 there still worth investing in .
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Page

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing value earphones. Much cheaper than the main branded earphones on the market use these whilst working out and doing housework. Good sound and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: LUCYPALLY

customer_reviews.title: Good for one song
customer_reviews.text: Charged earphones, lasted two songs then right ear turned off. Switched back on then left turned off. Charged again lasts for two songs. Bluetooth pairs straight away just battery power a let down.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Unpairing
customer_reviews.text: They keep impairing for no reason one earphone works the other doesn't at first I was well impressed with this product not so now.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby bushay

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest headphones...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is below mediocre and the battery life does not last very long. Would respectfully suggest considering a different pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Casian Todorov

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these thinking that they may not be of good quality and I just needed something for long commute. However I was surprised how good these sound. The sound quality was far more than what I expected. The only problem I had was once it was paired to my ipod the sound would drop and then come back. Not sure why it does that but after few minutes they work perfectly fine. Maybe it just takes slightly longer to pair.
customer_reviews.author: SRO

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleasantly surprised . Noise cancellation good. Battery life ok . I love them no problems so far and I've used them every day . Well worth the price as far as I'm concerned .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and bass to blow you away!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of wireless headphones. I was wary at first with them being so cheap however they've crushed my expectations plus better. PS I thought I broke them when i took one out my ear and the music stopped, until i put it back in and the music started again. Cool feature.
customer_reviews.author: Gregor Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money, my wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a stocking filler gift for my wife. I can’t vouch for the sound quality but she usss all the time at the gym etc and is really pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. P. Hillier

customer_reviews.title: Really great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with these earphones. Bought them to try out before I thought about more expensive ones but won’t be buying another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Auto reconnect is annoying
customer_reviews.text: These are good and comfortable when in use. The biggest downside is it reconnects to your phone after charging in the case which can be annoying if you answer your phone not knowing it's still connected.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant and reasonably price- well done
customer_reviews.text: Wow amazing sound. I'm delightfully surprised as I have tried quite a few of these wireless earphones. Well done nice one .Good sound fits easily. Fantastic at last some decent headphones for a reasonable price again well done !!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Evans

customer_reviews.title: a little bulky
customer_reviews.text: bought them as a gift and they were a great price ,they work well, the only downside the is case is bulky if you want it in trouser pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Vespa 90

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD CHARGE, DOES NOT PAIR UP TO ANY DEVICES, POOR QUALITY - AVOID
customer_reviews.text: This product is not capable of doing what it claims to do. Extremely unhappy with the quality of the product. Still not managed to be able to pair this up to any of my devices, and it does not hold a charge. Quality appears flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Bravo Robins

customer_reviews.title: Great for my grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson bought these himself and loves them. Kids at school made fun of him because they weren’t a well know brand but when they heard the sound the went quiet. Good product
customer_reviews.author: joan ashton

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money and it has really good sound. It has this good feature that if you take the right earphone out it pauses the music and plays when you put it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant considering they are very reasonably priced. Noise cancelling definitely works as my teenager cannot hear me shouting lol! Excellent sound quality too & battery life is enough for us.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Initially fitted with the smallest rubber cups and sound was rather "Tinny", however swapped then to larger cups which fitted in the ear better and the sound produced much better than expectations. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Countrydance

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good Very loud and stay in ears well Bad point- very large, almost embarrassing. Someone asked me if I have a toothbrush head in my ear
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved these They got perfectly The sounds really good on them Comes with the carry case as well
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but nothing special.
customer_reviews.text: No option to have different fittings for ear buds. Battery life for use on phone sat nav 2 hours best (airport run), music/videos 30-40 at half volume. Otherwise sounds are high quality materials are not half bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great but Bulky
customer_reviews.text: Great but Bulky, these are really good for the price. Only issue is they are Bulky which makes them uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: OTOOJ

customer_reviews.title: Broken After 6 Weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've had these earphones for 6 weeks & used them only a few times. The left earphone is now broken & does not play any sound. It is powered on because if i press the button on the earphone i can hear it saying "Voice Dialing" from the right earphone. This product is rubbish, please do not buy. I've wasted £15 on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr T.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Utterly useless. Not worth the money. Sound quality was dull on top volume. Sat in the ear ok til it’s knocked. Charged them for 8 hours and it lasted 25 minutes at best
customer_reviews.author: Connor mayhew

customer_reviews.title: okay but no microphone
customer_reviews.text: headphone are good could be a bit smaller but ok. only issue is that when you answer phone call no one can hear you. so guess no mic in the headphones. which suck
customer_reviews.author: Malika

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my holiday, I charged and tested them briefly and they worked fine. I tried to use them while away and they worked fine the first time, after charging and using for a second time the left one works for a couple of minutes and then turns itselfoff. I recharged and tested them again same thing happened it turned off after a couple of minutes. I sent a message to the seller about them weeks ago but have had no response.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Espin

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is as you would expect for this price bracket. Please do not buy expecting Beats or Bose quality - you will be sorely disappointed obviously (should go without saying!) The ear pieces are quite large and look a tiny bit silly on a smaller person. Would recommend for someone who can't be trusted to not lose things! I wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Xmas gift for my sister! She has been using since and says the sound is amazing! It's so clear and the battery lasts really well! She loves them
customer_reviews.author: xxJADEYxx

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm so pleased with these as they were so cheap. I like the colour as well so they're not pretending to be apple air pods too much. Pairing them initially was a bit of a challenge, but when I got there, they're so easy to pair instantly on my phone or laptop. Sometimes the sound jumps a bit, but that's almost always at the start of a song. The range is surprisingly decent!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Ring

customer_reviews.title: Horrible earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are truly awful. The sound quality is awful as is the build quality. They also do not disconnect/power off when placed back in their charging case. Don’t buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Green

customer_reviews.title: Hurricant !
customer_reviews.text: These are truly shocking. It’s hard enough trying to get them out of the case, and when you finally do get them out, the sound quality is like listening to your music through a tin of beans. I’m not going to comment on the pain these pieces of plastic caused to my ears, because, well, it’s still painful, and I only wore them for 40 minutes. Because I love her, I re-gifted these to my wife after I realised how bad they were. We are now happily divorced.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Better than Airpods by Far
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THEM! Haven't had to recharge them since I got them, the battery life is insane, personally think they look better than the Apple equivalent and are much less money. So happy I purchased them. Comfy in the ear and really excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Leoni Massey-Clamp

customer_reviews.title: Purchase Jan 20  - only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Jan 20, was very happy, they've been used twice a week for the gym which was great sadly now the right ear has stopped working today only the left so very disappointed they only last barley 3 months with light use. just when i need them for lockdown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with these great sound quality, base is surprisingly good for a cheap set and they feel comfortable and don’t fall out overall great set.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Best product I’ve bought all year
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much. The sound quality is very good, which is something I never expected for the cheap price. Comfort is great, they connect very well. I love these so much, and so will you!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Wireless pods
customer_reviews.text: These are ok I find them a struggle to fit in my ears and the music is not very loud on them but there ok wine so the Job and good battery life
customer_reviews.author: Carinaellie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I have received them today and its all great :-) super fast delivery and great sound. Dont know what the battery is like yet but will update soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound and call quality not as good as similarly priced competitors.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was not great. Call sound very poor - returned for competitor brand which was much better (Anker Soundcore).
customer_reviews.author: Simongyork

customer_reviews.title: Amazing buy these dont let such good quality pass you by
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these they are brilliant sounds amazing and goes everywhere chatges easy. Amazing quality for amazing price
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Williams

product_meta.title: Bluedio Bluetooth Earphones, Hi (Hurricane) True Wireless Earphones Earbuds TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Headphones in-Ear with Charging Case,Sport Headsets for Cell Phone/Running/Android/IOS,5Hrs Playtime
feature_bullets: ♪【BLUETOOTH 5.0 & TWS】- Adopt the most advanced Bluetooth 5.0 technology. Bluedio Hi Support A2DP, HSP, HFP, AVRCP. Provides in-call stereo sound. Also own fast and stable transmission without tangling.

♪【ONE STEP PAIRING】- Automatic system gives you a hassle-free experience when pairing and connecting to your devices. All you need to do just take them out from the case and turn on the left and right earbuds, two earbuds will connect automatically, put them on and you are ready to immerse in your music world.

♪【20H PLAYTING TIME WITH PORTABLE CHARGING CASE】The charge case holds roughly 4 full charges and each charge works for roughly 5 hours. About 1-hour charging you can make the earbuds battery from died to full charge, and only 2 hours for charging case.

♪【Latest Face Recognition Technology to Control Pause/Play】No longer use infrared sensing technology to control music pause and play, Bluedio introduces the latest face recognition technology to control music pause/play, it is more stable. When you take down the RIGHT earbud from you head, the music will pause, when you wear it, the music will continue to play.
♪【Package included】 - 1 x Bluedio Hi; 1 x Charging Case; 1 x Charger Cable; 1 x User Manual; 3 Pairs of eartips with 3 different sizes(S,M,L)
